HediffDef.label: mental assistant
HediffDef.description: A chip installed into the core assistant slot, this device aids the core intelligence with a variety of tasks. This assistant is specialized for imbuing the core intelligence with a much stronger mental resilience. A suite of individualized sub-routines remove many stressors and unpleasant issues from the intelligence's cognition, while training a greater capacity for overcoming difficult situations. Many synstructs view devices like this as a trusted - if somewhat dimwitted - friend, and find their own immortal-like existence much more bearable with it around.

HediffDef.label: coherence assistant
HediffDef.description: A chip installed into the core assistant slot, this device aids the core intelligence with a variety of tasks. This assistant has a suite of software systems designed to offload all internal monitoring and maintenance tasks from the core intelligence, autonomously handling all coherence needs. The assistant can completely negate the need for paying attention to coherence, but has a signficant impact on the intelligence's overall capability as it puts various systems into maintenance mode on a continuous, rotating basis.
